rows.label: qst102506_msg001
rows.name: 龍尽香採れなかった(仮)

rows.label: qst102506_msg003
rows.name: 助手のところに戻らなきゃ(仮)

rows.label: qst102506_msg101
rows.name: 龍尽香は取れたかい？(仮)

rows.label: qst102506_msg0001
rows.name:
Please open the path to the
Dragon's Stomach.

rows.label: qst102506_msg0002
rows.name:
We used to be able to get through
without any problem... Has the Invidian
Divine Beast closed it off for some reason...?

rows.label: qst102506_msg0101
rows.name:
So the path to the Dragon's Stomach
is open once more? Excellent!

rows.label: qst102506_msg0102
rows.name:
I see, I see... A number of Parisax
at the stomach's entrance...

rows.label: qst102506_msg0103
rows.name:
So that is why the path into the
stomach was blocked off.

rows.label: qst102506_msg0104
rows.name:
The Invidian Divine Beast itself must
have detected the Parisax's presence
and closed its own stomach off.

rows.label: qst102506_msg0105
rows.name:
Now that you have eliminated the
Parisax, the stomach is free to open
once more.

rows.label: qst102506_msg0106
rows.name:
Living bodies have many such natural
defense mechanisms. It's similar to how
humans cough when they fall ill.

rows.label: qst102506_msg0107
rows.name:
It's easy to forget since it is so large,
but Invidia itself is a living creature.

rows.label: qst102506_msg0108
rows.name:
Yes, this was a very educational
experience. Thank you.

rows.label: qst102506_msg0109
rows.name:
Well then, I will head to the stomach
and retrieve the Dragon Incense.

rows.label: qst102506_msg0110
rows.name:
Don't worry, I'll stay well hidden.
I've had quite enough of being
attacked by monsters!

rows.label: qst102506_msg0111
rows.name:
Ah yes, when you see Pilolo, could
you ask her to come and help me with
my Dragon Incense collecting?
